text.headline: Resort Golf in Egypt
text.text:
CEO Ibrahim El Missiri has advanced Somabay Golf Resort by adding a second golf course designed by Tim Lobb, EIGCA and James Edwards, EIGCA. The property is located in Somabay, Egypt, on the Red Sea coast. The second course is on the inland portion of the resort on desert and mountain view terrain.

Tim Lobb is a British golf course architect and a member of the European Institute of Golf Course Architects (EIGCA). Tim Lobb's design philosophy focuses on sustainability by routing golf courses through the natural environment while providing an enjoyable playing experience for golfers of all golf handicap skill levels. Unique, memorable golf courses with the preservation of natural resources minimizing water usage preserving native flora and fauna are all design impacts from Lobb.

Course Manager Andrew Hughes was the onsite for golf course construction and grow in. The team worked in conjunction with New Golf Course Development Consultant Mohammed Attallah, CCM. Springtime temperatures in March through May range from about 20째C (68째F) to 30째C (86째F).
